title: COVID Vaccine Information
cleaned_text: We currently have Moderna (primary and booster) and Pfizer Booster Be sure to fill out the form completely to get your appointment for the COVID Vaccine Information. We are located at the SW corner of Hwy 51 and Utica Road Take exit 72 on I-55 and go East. Turn South on Hwy 51 and continue to the 1st stop sign Please note: Special Instructions Use the following links for Information on Covid-19 or specific vaccines Monday through Friday 10:00 am to 5:00 pm 10:00am to 5:00pm to 5:00pm Use the following link to schedule an appointment and save time in store or you may walk in, fill out the forms and receive the next available time.
